meanings.sent1: The mononuclear cell contained only one nucleus.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed the mononuclear structure under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The mononuclear cell felt lonely with just one nucleus to keep it company.
meanings.sent4: Her focus was mononuclear, like a lone star shining brightly in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The mononuclear feature of the cell made it stand out among the others.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a cell with a single nucleus.
meanings.sent1: The mononuclear characteristics of the cell were clearly visible.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the mononuclear properties of the cell in detail.
meanings.sent3: The mononuclear cell was like a solo performer on a stage, commanding attention.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were mononuclear, focused on a single idea with unwavering determination.
meanings.sent5: The mononuclear nature of the cell made it unique in the biological world.
